CHAMPION_SKIN_15009_long: This limited time, loot-exclusive skin can drop as one of the three skin shards, or as a bonus permanent.
CHAMPION_SKIN_RENTAL_1010_long: Unleash mechanical mayhem when you forge this loot-exclusive skin shard.
CHAMPION_SKIN_RENTAL_120007: *New Loot Exclusive* Lancer Zero Hecarim skin shard
CHAMPION_SKIN_RENTAL_120007_long: Charge down the wicked when you forge this loot-exclusive skin shard.
CHAMPION_SKIN_RENTAL_122014_long: Decimate the cosmos when you forge this loot-exclusive skin shard.
CHAMPION_SKIN_RENTAL_67010_long: Condemn the darkest souls when you forge this loot-exclusive skin shard.
CHEST_106_long: A common orb sought by battle bosses everywhere. Available until 8/25/17 14:59.
CHEST_107_long: Greater than a Good Orb. Just look at the shooting star on this thing! Available until 8/25/17 14:59.
CHEST_108_long: The most powerful orb of all time and space and eternity, blessed by the 8-bit Baron himself. Available until 8/25/17 14:59.
CHEST_123_long: Get a guaranteed skin shard. This orb can also drop bonus loot; if you score, say it was pure skill.
CHEST_124_long: The legends are true: This one guarantees you a Legacy skin shard. This orb can also drop bonus loot.
CHEST_187_long: Used to forge a random emote.
CHEST_188_long:
Contains: One Champion Shard (or two lower-tier Champion Shards)
Chance to contain: PROJECT Champion Orb
CHEST_189_long:
Contains: One skin shard, 20 Orange Essence
Chance to contain: PROJECT Skin Orb, Emote Permanent, extra Orange Essence, gemstone, or Hextech Exclusive Skin Shard
CHEST_190_long: Contains a skin shard for a random PROJECT skin. Does not include PROJECT: Vayne, PROJECT: Vi, or PROJECT: Jhin.
CHEST_191_long:
Contains: Three skin shards, all guaranteed to be 355 or higher each, 60 Orange Essence

Chance to contain: 1-3 gemstones
LOOTBUNDLE_2_long:
Used to unlock loot-exclusive content, including:
- Hextech Annie
- Soulstealer Vayne
- Dreadnova Darius
- *New Loot Exclusive* Lancer Zero Hecarim
- Hextech Ward
LOOTBUNDLE_icon_cosmetic_1_long: Flair for you to wear whenever you log in.
LOOTTABLE_CHEST_champion_mastery_1: Skin Shard, Champion Shard, Ward Skin Shard, or Summoner Icon
LOOTTABLE_CHEST_champion_mastery_2_long:
Used to unlock loot-exclusive content, including:
- Hextech Annie
- Soulstealer Vayne

- *New Loot Exclusive* Lancer Zero Hecarim
- Hextech Ward
LOOTTABLE_chest_106_2_long: Reveals a random ward skin shard.
LOOTTABLE_chest_106_3_long: Flair for you to wear whenever you log in.
LOOTTABLE_chest_123_124_long: Reveals a random Hextech Exclusive skin shard.
LOOTTABLE_chest_124_0_long: Reveals a random Legacy skin shard.
LOOTTABLE_chest_54_long: Reveals a random Legacy skin shard.
LOOTTABLE_chest_88_1_long: Reveals an SKT, SSW, TPA, Fnatic, or Challenger skin shard, which are all Legacy.
LOOTTABLE_chest_99_1_long: Guaranteed to be an Epic skin or higher.
LOOTTABLE_chest_99_2_long: Could contain any skin tier. The skin of your dreams just might be in here.
LOOTTABLE_chest_generic_3_long: Reveals a random ward skin shard.
LOOTTABLE_chest_generic_4_long:
Includes:
- Hextech Annie
- Soulstealer Vayne
- Dreadnova Darius
- *New Loot Exclusive* Lancer Zero Hecarim
- Hextech Ward
better_rewards_day_one_modal_description: In the process, we merged your IP and Blue Essence. Completing the "Rune Collector" mission earns you Blue Essence based on how many runes and rune pages you owned as a thanks for participating in the old system. Afterwards, head over to the store to see what you can buy.
In the process, we merged your IP and Blue Essence. Head over to the store to see what you can buy.
Blue Essence now buys anything you used to buy with IP.
loot_chest_purchase_load_failed_body: Retrieving loot deals from the store failed. Please try again later.
loot_cta2_center_description: You've been awarded a special Chest with extra loot to try out the system. It includes:
loot_cta2_center_description2: We’ve also given you enough Essence to permanently unlock one of them right now by clicking on it in the Loot Inventory and selecting Upgrade.
loot_cta_center_description: Open Chests to find Shards of champions, skins, ward skins, and more.
loot_cta_left_description: Find Keys from matchmade games. Earn Chests when anyone in your premade party ranks S, up to 4 per month, but only one per champion per season.
loot_cta_right_description: Upgrade Shards into unlocked content, redeem them for a trial period, or re-roll them into other loot.
loot_description_CHAMPION_TOKEN_6: Used to advance the Mastery level of a specific champion. Acquired by grading S- or above on a level 5 Mastery champion.
loot_description_CHAMPION_TOKEN_7: Used to advance the Mastery level of a specific champion. Acquired by grading S or above on a level 6 Mastery champion.

loot_description_MATERIAL_key:
Opens locked Chests.

Collect 3 Key Fragments to create a Key. Play games to earn key fragments over time. Keys can also be purchased in the store.
loot_description_MATERIAL_key_fragment:
Collect 3 to create a Key.

Play games to earn key fragments over time.
loot_description_MATERIAL_rare: Rare crafting item. Can be forged into a loot exclusive

loot_description_chest_clash_test_box: A capsule containing one Tournament Ticket.
loot_description_lol_blue_essence: Material used to upgrade Champion Shards
loot_disenchant_description: will be added to your resources
loot_error_craft_failed_description: It appears this Hextech unit has a bad motivator. Please try restarting your client. If you continue to see this message please try again later; there may be issues with the service.
loot_error_craft_timeout_description: You hit the Hextech unit with your wrench but nothing happens. Please try restarting your client. If you continue to see this message please try again later; there may be issues with the service.
loot_error_disenchant_failed_description: Your Hextech unit sputters to a stop. You look inside; instead of delicious essence you find the same item you put in! Please try restarting your client. If you continue to see this message please try again later; there may be issues with the service.
loot_error_not_ready_description: Unable to retrieve some loot item data. Items may appear without icons or names. If so, please try restarting your client.
loot_error_redeem_failed_description: You drop in a shard, expecting a magical (and totally scientific) transformation... but instead your shard pops back out. Please try restarting your client. If you continue to see this message please try again later; there may be issues with the service.
loot_error_redeem_timeout_description: You hit the Hextech unit with your wrench but nothing happens. Please try restarting your client. If you continue to see this message please try again later; there may be issues with the service.
loot_help_modal_text_description_chest: Earn chests by achieving high grades in champion mastery, or purchase them from the store. Chests can drop all sorts of content, including legacy skins.
loot_help_modal_text_description_disench: Shards can be disenchanted for essence of the corresponding type. Champions are disenchanted into blue essence. Skins, summoner icons, ward skins, and emotes are disenchanted into orange essence.
loot_help_modal_text_description_essence: Use essence to upgrade shards into permanent content. Orange essence is used on cosmetic items, such as skins, summoner icons, and emotes. Blue essence is used on champions and champion mastery tokens. Rare gemstones are rarely dropped from chests, and are used to forge exclusive Hextech Crafting content.
loot_help_modal_text_description_forge: Forge recipes are used to create specialized content out of materials. Turn gemstones into exclusive Hextech skins, key fragments into keys, tokens into champion mastery levels, and more to come.
loot_help_modal_text_description_intro: Quick start guide to the Hextech Crafting system
loot_help_modal_text_description_rarity: Gem icons denote the rarity of content. There are currently four tiers of rarity.
loot_help_modal_text_description_rental: Shards can be consumed to unlock a rental version of that piece of content, with a seven day duration. The shard is destroyed in the process.
loot_help_modal_text_description_reroll: Reroll three items of the same type to obtain a random, unowned permanent item of the same type. This will destroy the three items used in the reroll process.
loot_help_modal_text_description_upgrade: Spend essence to turn your shards into permanent content. Permanent content can be immediately redeemed and used.
loot_invalid_action_missing_ingredients: Add the correct ingredients to perform this action.
loot_loading_fail: Loading failed, please try again later

loot_purchase_chest_option_1_description: What's in the box? Acquire random Champion, Skin, Ward Skin, Summoner Icon, and Gemstone crafting components.
Premium Chests frequently drop permanents. This bundle also includes one bonus Gemstone! Limited time only!
